backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles plus per-user note CRUD with access control and blob image references.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text mapping frontend file paths to short human-written summaries of each component or utility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS definitions for global styles and dark-mode color tokens using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that enforces Internet Identity login, loads user profiles, forces dark mode, and shows profile setup or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenImageM: Modal for displaying a fullscreen image with backdrop click and close button.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Card component showing a note preview with edit/delete actions, timestamp, and optional encrypted indicator.
Note detail modal supporting decryption UI, image viewing, edit/delete, and timestamp display.
frontend/src/components/NoteFormModal.ts: Modal for creating or editing notes with encryption, text import, and image attachments.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user's display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and triggers query invalidation when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point rendering the app and wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen prompting the user to authenticate with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/screens/NotesDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing search, list of notes, and modals for viewing or editing notes.
frontend/src/utils/cryptoNotes.ts: Provides password-based AES-GCM encryption/decryption using PBKDF2 with salt and IV handling.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachments.ts: Validates image files by type and size and generates data URL previews via FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/noteSearch.ts: Filters notes by checking case-insensitive matches in title or content.
frontend/src/utils/txtImport.ts: Reads plain text files (.txt) and returns their contents using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting hash-based routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture, issues, and image requirements for the notes app.
